channel.title: Predictive Analysis on Asante's Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Predictive Analysis on Asante's Lab

item.title: Predicting Apartment Prices in Beijing
item.description: Project Description: Overview This project focuses on predicting apartment prices in Beijing using machine learning models. The dataset used for this analysis contains various features related to apartment listings, including location, amenities, and other relevant details. The goal is to build a model that accurately predicts apartment prices based on these features. Steps Data Cleaning: Removed irrelevant columns such as ‘url’, ‘id’, and others. Eliminated outliers by trimming the dataset based on the total price.

item.title: Netflix Movie Duration Analysis
item.description: Project Overview: The Netflix Movie Duration Analysis serves as a comprehensive exploration into the trends of movie durations on the Netflix platform. This data science capstone project commences with a background to the analysis, highlighting Netflix’s evolution from a DVD rental service to the largest entertainment and media company. The primary objective is to investigate the claim that the average duration of movies on Netflix has been declining. Data Loading and Exploration:
